actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to permit the deposit of newspapers and political campaign literature in letter boxes without the payment of postage.

summary.text: Permits the deposit of newspapers and political campaign literature in letter boxes without the payment of postage. Defines "daily newspaper" and "political campaign literature" for purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to permit the deposit of newspapers and political campaign literature in letter boxes without the payment of postage.
